Explore London with our eco-friendly cycling tours

Our mission

Our mission with Re-cycle is to offer visitors a different eco-friendly way to explore London. We want to show people other ways to travel but still beeing sustainable. Our employees

We are passionate Londoners that know the city by heart, and want to share it with people from all over the world.
